#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define REP(i,n) for(int (i)=0;(i)<(int)(n);(i)++)
#define snuke(c,itr) for(__typeof((c).begin()) itr=(c).begin();itr!=(c).end();itr++)

typedef long long ll;
#define MOD 1000000007ll
using namespace std;

int n,k,c[505],b[505], a[505], temp[505];

    
int main(){
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);

    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--){
        cin >> n >> k;
        memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
        REP(i,n) cin >> a[i];
        memset(c,0,sizeof(c));
        memset(b,0,sizeof(b));
        memset(temp,0,sizeof(temp));
        c[0] = 1, c[1] = 1, c[n-1] = 1;
        b[0] = 1;
        while (k){
            if (k & 1){
                for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
                    for(int j = 0; j < n; j++){
                        temp[i] ^= (b[j] * c[(j-i+n)%n]);
                    }
                }
                for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
                    b[i] = temp[i];
                    temp[i] = 0;
                }
            }
            for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
                for(int j = 0; j < n; j++){
                    temp[i] ^= (c[j] * c[(j-i+n)%n]);
                }
            }
            for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
                c[i] = temp[i];
                temp[i] = 0;
            }
            k >>= 1;
        }

        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
            for(int j = 0; j < n; j++){
                temp[i] ^= (a[j] * b[(j-i+n) % n]);
            }
        }
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
            cout << temp[i]  << " ";
            //            temp[i] = 0;
        }
        cout << endl;
        
        
                        
        
        
        
    }
}
